solution_line_template: Sunday's class is half the size of Saturday's class with {saturday_kids} kids so Sunday has {saturday_kids}/{sunday_half_factor} = <<{saturday_kids}/{sunday_half_factor}={sunday_kids}>>{sunday_kids} kids
She has {saturday_kids} kids on Saturday and {sunday_kids} kids on Sunday for a total of {saturday_kids}+{sunday_kids} = <<{saturday_kids}+{sunday_kids}={total_kids}>>{total_kids} kids

She charges ${charge_per_kid} per kid and teaches {total_kids} kids over the weekend so she makes {charge_per_kid}*{total_kids} = $<<{charge_per_kid}*{total_kids}={total_money_made}>>{total_money_made}
